Text: The Spectre Knight is a one-act "fanciful operetta" with a libretto by James Albery and music by Alfred Cellier.
Triplets:<The Spectre Knight
1:
--------------------
Text: The Spectre Knight:  It was first performed on 9 February 1878 at the Opera Comique by the Comedy Opera Company as a companion piece to "The Sorcerer".

<Text: The Spectre Knight:  The piece had a run in New York in 1880 and was toured in Britain and America.>
